column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place was packed on a Wednesday night
column2: with a wait of ~45 minutes around 8pm.  Had the Lou's special (mushrooms
column4: tomatos) & fried calamari (mediocre).  To be honest
column5: I'm not sure this is the best deep dish in Chicago but Lou's is an institution nonetheless.  This location is on a surprisingly quiet block of River North
